description: Produced by the Light corporation and modified by you, this stylish staff not only functions as a light source, but doubles as a weapon due to the superalloy materials it is made of. Due to proprietary efficiency improvements over standard light sources, the L-stick is apparently capable of being powered by an rtg taken from a Curie-G coffeemaker. It is currently shedding light.

use_action.msg: You close the shutter on the staff and block the light.
